## NINodeCanvasImageSource type

Node interface for [NodeCanvasRenderingContext2D](./canvas-cleave.nodecanvasrenderingcontext2d.md) input image type support.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type NINodeCanvasImageSource = NINodeCanvas | NINodeImage | NodeImageBitmap;
```
